mapper.select: SELECT ct_idx, ct_title, mb_id, ct_datetime, (select count(bb_idx) from cp_board_blind cbb where cbb.bb_relation_idx = cct.ct_idx and cbb.bb_relation = "cp_crew_together") as bb_count FROM cp_crew_together cct

SELECT ct_idx, ct_title, mb_id, ct_datetime, ct_content, ct_people_cnt, ct_gender, ct_age, ct_wish_start, ct_wish_end, ct_tool, ct_camping_type, ct_pet, (select ca_name from cp_camping cc where cc.ca_idx = cct.ca_idx) as ca_name, (select mb_nickname from cp_member cm where cm.mb_id = cct.mb_id) as mb_nickname, (select count(bb_idx) from cp_board_blind cbb where cbb.bb_relation_idx = cct.ct_idx and cbb.bb_relation = "cp_crew_together") as bb_count FROM cp_crew_together cct WHERE ct_idx = #{param1}
